Posts.Content: Apr 13, 2011 01:16PM - edited Apr 13, 2011 01:39PM by amm42 Hi.  I just found this site this week.  I am scheduled for a mx on April 28 with immediate reconstruction.  I was diagnosed back in January and since then have had a lumpectomy and then a re-exision (sp?).  It is lobular in nature and has wandered more than they thought so while they think they got it all, the mastectomy was my best option to be sure.  As of right now I do not need any treatments after but they also thought this would be a "little lumpectomy" so who knows.  I have been doing really well but freaking out a bit today.  Just trying to finish up my work and school (I am a student as well) world as I anticipate being out of commission for a while.  Having a hard time keeping my daughter (9) and mother calm.  Luckily my son and husband are ok and keeping me grounded!
